comment:
"По клику на трупы оперативников Железного шепота, ряженых в культистов
Успех чека персепшна"

languages.text: Эти мертвые еретики подозрительно отличаются от остальных — символы на их одежде исполнены неточно, а под богохульными тряпками скрыта одинаковая военная униформа.
These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.
languages.original_text: Эти мертвые еретики подозрительно отличаются от остальных — символы на их одежде исполнены неточно, а под богохульными тряпками скрыта одинаковая военная униформа.

traits.locale_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.
These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.
These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.
These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

languages.text: Diese toten Ketzer sehen verdächtig anders aus als die übrigen: Die Symbole auf ihren Kleidern sind falsch gezeichnet, und unter den blasphemistischen Lumpen blitzen Militäruniformen durch.
languages.original_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

traits.locale_text: Diese toten Ketzer sehen verdächtig anders aus als die übrigen: Die Symbole auf ihren Kleidern sind falsch gezeichnet, und unter den blasphemistischen Lumpen blitzen Militäruniformen durch.

languages.text: Curieusement, ces hérétiques sont différents des autres : les symboles figurant sur leurs vêtements sont mal dessinés, et il est possible de reconnaître des uniformes militaires standard sous les guenilles impies.
languages.original_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

traits.locale_text: Curieusement, ces hérétiques sont différents des autres : les symboles figurant sur leurs vêtements sont mal dessinés, et il est possible de reconnaître des uniformes militaires standard sous les guenilles impies.

languages.text: 这些死了的异端分子，看起来和其他人相当不一样。他们衣服上的邪教印记画错了，透过渎神的破布，你看到了军队的制服。
languages.original_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

traits.locale_text: 这些死了的异端分子，看起来和其他人相当不一样。他们衣服上的邪教印记画错了，透过渎神的破布，你看到了军队的制服。

languages.text: 命を落とした異端者達は、不審なほどに他の連中とは異なっている。服に描かれたシンボルは間違っており、冒涜的なボロ着から標準装備の軍服が透けて見えていた。
languages.original_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

traits.locale_text: この命を落とした異端者達は、怪しいほど他の異端者とは異なっている。服に描かれたシンボルは間違っており、冒涜的なボロ着から標準装備の軍服が透けて見える。

languages.text: Estos herejes muertos son sospechosamente diferentes de los demás: los símbolos de sus ropas están mal dibujados, y los uniformes militares reglamentarios se ven a través de los harapos blasfemos.
languages.original_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

traits.locale_text: Estos herejes muertos son sospechosamente diferentes de los demás: los símbolos de sus ropas están mal dibujados, y los uniformes militares reglamentarios se ven a través de los harapos blasfemos.

languages.text: Bu ölü kâfirler, diğerlerinden şüphe çekecek derecede farklı. Kıyafetlerindeki semboller yanlış çizilmiş ve standart askerî üniformaların arasından küfür dolu paçavralar görünüyor.
languages.original_text: These dead heretics are suspiciously different from the others: the symbols on their clothes are drawn wrongly, and standard-issue military uniforms show through the blasphemous tatters.

traits.locale_text: Bu ölü kâfirler hiç şüphesiz diğerlerinden farklı. Kıyafetlerindeki semboller yanlış çizilmiş ve standart askerî üniformaların arasından küfür dolu paçavralar görünüyor.
